Uses of Interface
tilegame.GameObserver

Packages that use GameObserver
Package
Description
game2048
game2048 contains all necessary files and implementations to run a 2048 game instance.
sokoban
sokoban contains all necessary files and implementations to run a sokoban game instance.
tilegame
tilegame contains the base classes to create a tile based game.

  • Uses of GameObserver in game2048

    Classes in game2048 that implement GameObserver
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Console2048
    The Console2048 class is a class that is used to see the actual GameModel2048 values.
    class 
    GameGUI2048
    The GameGUI2048 class creates a window to represent the GameModel2048 class graphically.
